DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerablility AZD1656 multiple repeat oral dos patient type 2 diabetes top metformin .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Safety Tolerability After Multiple Oral Doses AZD1656 Type 2 Diabetes Patients Top Metformin
DOC.criteria: Male female ( non childbearing potential ) Diagnosed diabetes Mellitus patient treat metformin alone one antidiabetic drug . Stable blood sugar control indicate change treatment within 3 month prior study start.t HbA1c < 11 % screening ( HbA1c value accord international DCCT standard ) Clinically significant illness clinically relevant trauma , judge investigator , within two week first administration IP History ischemic heart disease , stroke , transitorisk ischemic attack symptomatic peripheral vascular disease Clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , hematology , urinalysis result .
